Hear the words of the great Teacher: "For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world." There is no need to be dull and indolent, to live only for common earthly excitement. Light is given to every believer, as well as comfort and sobriety. All may have joy, because of the satisfaction of having Christ as an abiding guest in the soul. 


                                   - 63 -
